intro: Boldoa ovatifolia, commonly known as the broad-leaf boldoa, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. Boldoa ovatifolia is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a houseplant due to its striking appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
